# Plan: MCP Config Sync Between Two Locations

## Context

After MCP consolidation, the same config now lives in two files:
- `~/.mcp.json` — home root (documented as user-scope by Claude Code docs)
- `~/.claude/mcp.json` — inside .claude directory (what the user found in their editor)

Both are read by Claude Code. Keeping them manually in sync is error-prone. We need a zero-maintenance solution.

## Recommended Approach: Symlink

Make `~/.mcp.json` a symlink pointing to `~/.claude/mcp.json`.
